meanings.definition: To restore color to (something) by repigmenting.
meanings.sent1: She repigmented the old painting to make it colorful again.
meanings.sent2: The artist repigmented the faded mural on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The room looked so dull until she repigmented the walls with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: Her smile repigmented his gloomy mood with happiness.
meanings.sent5: The garden was repigmented with blooming flowers after the rain.

meanings.sent1: The repigmented flowers brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent2: The repigmented hair looked natural and beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The repigmented sky after the storm was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: Her repigmented skin glowed with health under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The repigmented leaves on the tree shimmered in the sunlight.
